News.headline: Match Preview: Tranmere Rovers v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Preview: Tranmere Rovers v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Tranmere Rovers v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League away match against Tranmere Rovers on Saturday
News.description:
The Daggers play their first competitive match since the 7th of January following last week’s postponement at home to Bromley. The Daggers will be looking to continue their good away form after winning four of the last five games away from home.

Tranmere currently sit 3rd in the Vanarama National League and are one point ahead of the Daggers. Rovers have only conceded eight goals at home all season and will look to build on their four straight wins at home in all competitions.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
North Ferriby 0-4 Daggers
Daggers 3-0 Braintree
Braintree 3-2 Daggers
Daggers 4-4 Solihull Moors
Daggers 1-2 Worthing
 
Tranmere
Tranmere 4-1 South Park (FA Trophy)
Macclesfield 4-2 Tranmere
Tranmere 1-0 Macclesfield
Lincoln 2-1 Tranmere
Wrexham 0-1 Tranmere (FA Trophy)

Team News
Scott Doe returns from his two match suspension. Jake Howells and Jake Sheppard are set to make their debut for the Daggers following their arrivals.

Previous Meetings
The two teams have met five times with the Daggers winning once and Rovers winning twice. The teams met in October and the Daggers were frustratingly held to a 0-0 draw against the 10 men of Tranmere. The last time the Daggers played at Prenton Park they ran out 3-2 winners.

Fixtures
Due to Lincoln City and Sutton United’s involvement in the FA Cup this weekend there are 10 games taking place in the Vanarama National League on Saturday. KO at 3pm
Aldershot V York
Barrow V Forest Green
Bromley V Southport
Dover V Chester
Eastleigh V Woking
North Ferriby V Macclesfield
Solihull V Maidstone
Torquay V Gateshead
Tranmere V Dagenham and Redbridge
Wrexham V Boreham Wood

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.
 
Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
